markdown:
<title level="1" right="Background " pfs="Standard">[Entertainer](/Backgrounds.aspx?ID=13)</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 61 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

</column>

Through an education in the arts or sheer dogged practice, you learned to entertain crowds. You might have been an actor, a dancer, a musician, a street magician, or any other sort of performer.

Choose two ability boosts. One must be to Dexterity
or Charisma, and one is a free ability boost.

You're trained in the [Performance](/Skills.aspx?ID=12) skill, and the [Theater Lore](/skills/lore) skill. You gain the [Fascinating Performance](/Feats.aspx?ID=781) skill feat.
name: Entertainer

text: Entertainer Source Core Rulebook pg. 61 4.0 Through an education in the arts or sheer dogged practice, you learned to entertain crowds. You might have been an actor, a dancer, a musician, a street magician, or any other sort of performer. Choose two ability boosts. One must be to Dexterity or Charisma, and one is a free ability boost. You're trained in the Performance skill, and the Theater Lore skill. You gain the Fascinating Performance skill feat.
